summary.action: Have trained hundreds of students in Javascript, Python, Ruby and PHP as an Instructor for General Assembly coding bootcamps.
Worked on and tested Web Applications such as Pit Pay and others as a Full Stack Developer for Crossfield Digital.
Have worked on freelance development projects that have involved Flask, Svelte, Gatsby, Contentful and more.
Have created a vast amount of technical content as a developer advocate for Dremio, Blogger for Logrocket, and on my own personal blogs, youtube and podcasts

skills.frontend: React, Vue, Angular, Svelte, StencilJS, SolidJS, NextJS, Astro, SvelteKit jQuery, Redux, Styled Components, Grommet, React Bootstrap, Buefy, Bulma, Materialize, Bootstrap, Web Components, RemixJS
skills.backend: ExpressJS, KoaJS, FoalTS, NestJS, Go/Buffalo, Go/Echo, Ruby/Rails, Ruby/Sinatra, Python/Django, Python/Flask, Python/FastAPI, PHP/Laravel, MongoDB, PostgresQL/SQL, Apollo Server/GraphQL, Neo4J/CQL
skills.languages: Javascript, Typescript, Python, Ruby, PHP, Go, Ballerina, Rust, Java, C#, Dart, Java, Scala, SQL
skills.devops: Docker, AWS Lambda, AWS Glue, AWS EMR, AWS IAM, Netlify Functions, Firebase, Firestore, Netlify, Heroku, Vercel, Jest, Cypress, CircleCI, Github Actions
skills.productivity: Google Docs, Airtable, Asana, Trello, Microsoft Office, Zoom, Google Hangouts, Slack, Discord
skills.data: Apache Spark, Apache Iceberg, Apache Arrow, Dremio, Flink

employment.name: Dremio

employment.name: General Assembly

employment.description: Would deliver in-person and online training to financial professionals. Was also involved in product development, marketing, operations and accounting for the business.
